pages.text: $(li)The Netherite Monstrosity is an ancestral golem that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/soul_black_smith)Soul Black Smith$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will attack you with low-ranged attacks, or shooting lava when you are too away and it is able to heal itself sucking out lava.$(br)$(li)Once it reaches 33% health, it becomes enraged, attacking more often and catching fire.

pages.name: Netherite Monstrosity
pages.text: It drops a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/cataclysm/monstrous_horn)Monstruos Horn$(/l), the $(l:patchouli:weapons/infernal_forge)Infernal Forge$(/l) and rarely a Music Disc upon death.
